plot: A French farce set in Victorian London where a botanist and his wife get into trouble when they pretend to go missing in order to hide from their sanctimonious cousin -- an Anglican bishop who is leading a campaign against such writing.
title: Drôle de drame ou L'étrange aventure du Docteur Molyneux
plot_es: A French farce set in Victorian London where a botanist and his wife get into trouble when they pretend to go missing in order to hide from their sanctimonious cousin -- an Anglican bishop who is leading a campaign against such writing.
original_name: Drôle de drame ou L'étrange aventure du Docteur Molyneux
plot_en: A French farce set in Victorian London where a botanist and his wife get into trouble when they pretend to go missing in order to hide from their sanctimonious cousin -- an Anglican bishop who is leading a campaign against such writing.

cast.role: William Kramps dit Le tueur de bouchers
cast.name: Jean-Louis Barrault
